text:
Very good service! I came to fix my scooter. I didn't wait and I had it fixed very quickly. The man was friendly and efficient.
The place is a bit hard to find. It's on the 9th floor, don't hesitate to ask for your way, nice people gave me directions.

I was so pleased with the service at this small shop. It's on the 9th floor and is nestled amongst some industrial outlets. My son's micro scooter was totally refurbished with new brakes, back wheels, and handle grips. There are a wide range of accessories as well. Not too expensive and well worth the taxi journey.

Awesome experience and a happy customer! Would like to thank the mister who attended to us earlier today. So glad I bought this brand‚Äôs scooter for my kid cause firstly, the scooter is great and secondly, the after service is one of the best! üëçüèª

Thank you to the team at White and Black trading who fixed my husbands scooter.

We have many items from W&B and are never disappointed with their service and commitment to customer service.

Thank you.
